about_the_game:
Wade into the ripples of time, where every move counts and the dream may never let you go.

Lost in a city adrift in the mist, you find yourself chasing whispers of power and salvation. Time bends to your command—a fleeting grace from the King—but the sand in your hourglass runs thin. Streets shift with every step, revealing new paths and strange opportunities. In this roguelite tactical game, your choices ripple outward, daring you to master the unknown or succumb to it.

Weave Through Time

Wield the King’s grace to travel through time on battlefields. Rewind the timeline, slipping between moments to weave impossible tactics—outmaneuvering foes with strategies that only exist in dreams. Your actions blur the line between reality and possibility.

Master the Foresight

As you move through time, gain the power of prescience. Predict enemy moves with uncanny precision, setting the stage for synchronized attacks. Master the flow of time and strike in perfect harmony, turning foresight into devastating sequences of triumph—or chaos.

Navigate a Shifting City

Wander streets that realign and transform ahead of you. Each step uncovers new encounters and strange discoveries in a city that is never the same twice.

Wager What You Have

Manage your precious sand and rare jewels as both lifelines and temptations. Use them to push forward, secure critical advantages, or recover from perilous encounters.

Dive into Endless Possibility

Start each dream anew and face cryptic battles, surreal encounters, and cursed treasures bathed in black sunlight. What lies beyond the next corner? Only those who dare will find out.

Lose Yourself in the Unknown

The mist hides more than streets: answers, horrors, and perhaps even yourself. Echoes of unseen footsteps and whispers of impossible beings accompany your journey, daring you to grasp at the truths the city refuses to reveal.

Step into Timelake, where strategy is your only anchor in a world unmoored by time and madness.

name: Timelake: Time Travel Tactics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card or onboard chipset
  • VR Support: Not applicable
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Plan battles across timelines, plot your way through shifting streets, and risk your dwindling resources in this roguelite strategy game laced with cosmic horror. Slip into a dream where time unravels, the mist hides what’s beyond reach, and all you seek—or fear—awaits in the forgotten city.
